<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script to be used for interim duration for the internal systems (e.g. HI), where these systems got the values for phase_type as "plan", "development" and "testing", where the values need to be changed ot "watefall", "agile" and "test".
</description>
        <name>SetNewPhaseTypeValue</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[
    
var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('planned_task');
mUpdate.addQuery("phase_type", "Plan");
mUpdate.setValue("phase_type", "waterfall");
mUpdate.execute();
    
var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('planned_task');
mUpdate.addQuery("phase_type", "planning");
mUpdate.setValue("phase_type", "waterfall");
mUpdate.execute();

var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('planned_task');
mUpdate.addQuery("phase_type", "development");
mUpdate.setValue("phase_type", "agile");
mUpdate.execute();

var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('planned_task');
mUpdate.addQuery("phase_type", "testing");
mUpdate.setValue("phase_type", "test");
mUpdate.execute();

]]></script>
